Info.Writer: Matt Greenberg (screenplay), Scott Alexander (screenplay), Larry Karaszewski (screenplay), Stephen King (short story)
Info.Actors: John Cusack, Tony Shalhoub, Len Cariou, Isiah Whitlock Jr.
Info.Plot: A man who specialises in debunking paranormal occurrences checks into the fabled room 1408 in the Dolphin Hotel. Soon after settling in, he confronts genuine terror.
